content.raw:
MEMO

confirmed with
```
$ GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=`pwd` GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=`pwd` roslaunch gazebo_ros empty_world.launch world_name:=`pwd`/example.world
$ cat example.world
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<sdf version="1.4">
  <world name="default">
    <!-- Gravity -->
    <physics type="ode">
      <gravity>0 0 -1.6350</gravity> <!-- 1/6 of 9.80665 -->
    </physics>
    <!-- A global light source -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>
    <!-- A hightmap plane -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://lunar_tranquillitatis_pit</uri>
    </include>
    <include>
      <uri>model://pioneer2dx</uri>
    </include>
    <scene>
      <ambient>0.4 0.4 0.4 1.0</ambient>
      <background>0.1 0.1 0.1 1</background>
      <grid>false</grid>
      <sky>
        <time>13</time>
        <sunrise>12</sunrise>
        <sunset>12</sunset>
        <clouds>
          <humidity>0</humidity>
        </clouds>
      </sky>
   </scene>
  </world>
</sdf>

```
content.html:
MEMO

confirmed with

$ GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=`pwd` GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=`pwd` roslaunch gazebo_ros empty_world.launch world_name:=`pwd`/example.world
$ cat example.world
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<sdf version="1.4">
  <world name="default">
    <!-- Gravity -->
    <physics type="ode">
      <gravity>0 0 -1.6350</gravity> <!-- 1/6 of 9.80665 -->
    </physics>
    <!-- A global light source -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>
    <!-- A hightmap plane -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://lunar_tranquillitatis_pit</uri>
    </include>
    <include>
      <uri>model://pioneer2dx</uri>
    </include>
    <scene>
      <ambient>0.4 0.4 0.4 1.0</ambient>
      <background>0.1 0.1 0.1 1</background>
      <grid>false</grid>
      <sky>
        <time>13</time>
        <sunrise>12</sunrise>
        <sunset>12</sunset>
        <clouds>
          <humidity>0</humidity>
        </clouds>
      </sky>
   </scene>
  </world>
</sdf>
